title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple chat & generate calls plus streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model support, file uploads, and settings panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby interface to chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive TUI chat client for Ollama written in Go; markdown rendering, history, multi-line input.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVCs.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Phi-3, Mistral, Zephyr, and more; ready-to-use tags.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open WebUI, Weaviate vector DB, and Nginx proxy.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; zero-dependency TypeScript client with full API coverage.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; lightweight Python client with sync & async APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed client using reqwest and serde.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app for Ollama with session memory, model selector, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for AI-assisted note writing and summarization.
